channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: Migrant workerâ€™s Covid-19 curiosity keeps colleagues infection-free
item.description:
May 19, 2020 4:00 AM

The coronavirus crisis has shone a light on the plight of foreign workers and their unique challenges, including the need to keep their families back home financially secure. One worker has managed to resolve that issue with a mobile app while helping his fellow workers stay infection-free
